title: Petrify
desc:
Post 1811
- Target a player. Every card in their hand gets **Stoned**.
- Then, inflict them with an amount of **Gloom** equal to 5 - (the number of **Stoned** cards in their hand), if they have less than 5.
- If they have more than 5 **Stoned** cards, one of your other cards gets **Stoned** as well.
